metadata.title: CVE-2020-29260 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: libvncclient v0.9.13 was discovered to contain a memory leak via thefunction rfbClientCleanup().

criterions.comment: italc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
